item.title: Comment on Pizza Dough by italianpot
item.dc:creator: italianpot
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://domsites.github.io/italianpot/pizza-dough/#comment-77">Brian</a>.
Hi Brian, Sorry, I should add these details in the recipe.
For a 24h raise. Put the dough in the fridge in a closed container, and let it stay for 11 hours. Then out for 6h, and after doing the dough balls 4. For the 9h raise. After mixing let it raise in a closed container for 5h and 4h after the dough balls.
I usually do the balls around the 300g, 270g to 320g.
As soon as I can I'll update the recipe, hope all is clear if not please let me know. Thank you and have a delicious pizza!
If you can please send me some picture of your pizza. :)
